name: web3-certificate-validation-system
description: Decentralized certificate validation system using blockchain, IPFS, and Web3

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.hardhat:deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run hardhat:node" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.test: npm run hardhat:test && cd backend && npm test
